column4: hello, I have a usbdisk that i always used in windows but now i cannot write or remove anything on it, is there anything i can do ?
Probably ntfs format
Is there anyway to change that
64 Mb
What error do you get..
well i cannot write or delete anything, it says i do not have permission to do it
But you can read it with no problems correct?
yes
Easiest solution is to format it to fat
is there any simple way of doing that ?
Save everything n there to another location... run gparted and tell us what it shows you.
Are you in windows or linux atm
linux
k.. run gparted...
i don't have any computer with windows near me
i have to install it first
i get three lines
i/dev/sdb1 is formatted fat16
how did you mount it..?
DO you have more than one user setup on your system
no
